message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and rarity. I'm confident you'll love it!

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, $18000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Let me know if you're open to that price.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $18000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $16500. This is a very competitive price, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this unique product. Let me know if you're interested!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $15000. It's my final offer, and I'm ready to move forward with the purchase if you accept it.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your original offer of $15000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $16000. This is a very fair price, considering the product's value and rarity. I hope you'll reconsider and accept this offer. Let me know what you think!
